facebook.sdk
Class FacebookApp

WEB-INF.cftags.component
        facebook.sdk.FacebookApp

public class FacebookApp

extends WEB-INF.cftags.component

A library to build iFrame/FBML apps for Facebook.com and social websites with Facebook Connect
